Nightlight:::

Nightlight said "What's going on?"she walked towards Owlhawk and 
said "Er... Excuse me, he"she said pointed towards Wheeljack-x "and I 
are new... what's going on? is it true that Talon has death?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk starts to say "shouldn't it be Maximals Maximize and walk,

the
